name: How to identify interavls
description: A simple step-by-step guide on music theory which helps you to identify intervals faster.

step.name: Start with the root note
step.text: Start with your first note (the root), e. g. C

step.name: Count the number of steps
step.text: Count up using every note from the musical scale until you reach your second note, e.g. start at C (1), then count D (2), E (3), F (4), and finally G (5). This gives you a 'fifth.'
